price: Охиратда айнан шулар энг зиён кўргувчилар бўлишига шак-шубҳа йўқ.
arabic: لَا جَرَمَ أَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلۡأَخۡسَرُونَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: lā jarama annahum fī al-ākhirati humu al-akhsarūna
